name: space-exploration-bridge-mod
title: Space Exploration Angels Compatibility
author: Pengwin
description: This mod is meant to increase compatibility between Space Exploration and Angel's Mods, e.g. enabling missing steam-cracking & liquifying recipes from Angel's Petrochem in Space Explorations' biochem labs for the production of lubricant, which is mandatory for all basic liquids in space. More features in detailed.
